description: This file defines a UI component called 'NoteEditor' using the LightningJS framework. The component provides a note editing interface with properties for value and title, display templates, computed properties, watchers, methods for getting/setting content, and input event handlers.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS UI component for editing notes, including title and content, with save functionality and input handling.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Emits a 'save' event with current title and content.
